verses.plain: Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.

tokens.t: Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.

verses.plain: Bear ye one another’s burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.

tokens.t: Bear ye one another’s burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.

verses.plain: For if a man think himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceiveth himself.

tokens.t: For if a man think himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceiveth himself.

verses.plain: But let every man prove his own work, and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone, and not in another.

tokens.t: But let every man prove his own work, and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone, and not in another.

verses.plain: For every man shall bear his own burden.

tokens.t: For every man shall bear his own burden.

verses.plain: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things.

tokens.t: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things.

verses.plain: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.

tokens.t: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.

verses.plain: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.

tokens.t: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.

verses.plain: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.

tokens.t: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.

verses.plain: As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all men, especially unto them who are of the household of faith.

tokens.t: As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all
, especially unto them who are of the household of faith.

verses.plain: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand.

tokens.t: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand.

verses.plain: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh, they constrain you to be circumcised; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ.

tokens.t: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh, they constrain you to be circumcised; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ.

verses.plain: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law; but desire to have you circumcised, that they may glory in your flesh.

tokens.t: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law; but desire to have you circumcised, that they may glory in your flesh.

verses.plain: But God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.

tokens.t: But God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.

verses.plain: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature.

tokens.t: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature.

verses.plain: And as many as walk according to this rule, peace be on them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.

tokens.t: And as many as walk according to this rule, peace
on them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.

verses.plain: From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.

tokens.t: From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.

verses.plain: Brethren, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.

tokens.t: Brethren, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ
with your spirit. Amen.
